PSCT.Vegas:
① If this card is in your hand/GY: You can tribute 3 Level 3 or lower WATERS; Special Summon it.
② If you do: Return all Spells/Traps on the field to the hand, and if you do, if 3 or more cards were rethrned to the hand this way, all monsters your opponent controls lose 300 ATK for each.

PSCT.Base: You can Tribute 3 Level 3 or lower WATER monsters; Special Summon this card from your hand or Graveyard. When you do: Return all Spell and Trap Cards on the field to the hand, and if you do, if 3 or more cards are returned to the hand by this effect, all monsters your opponent currently controls lose 300 ATK for each.
